name: 經濟學（二）
comment: 企管系大一學生學號末碼為單數號請選修經濟學(二)A班;末碼為雙數號請選修經濟學(二)B班。欲加修本課程的學生，請務必出席第一節課處理授權碼事宜，不必事先寫信給教授。2/17和2/24採線上上課,上課網址: https://meet.google.com/ppd-fbof-gbh
goals: Students will understand the general business fundamentals and advanced management knowledge
Students will have a solid comprehension of and be able to employ compelling quantitative analytical methodologies in the business setting.
Students will comprehend, from a global perspective, political, economic, social, and technological factors that may shape business operation and performance.
Students will be able to make clear and logical oral presentation.
syllabus:
Week 1. Introduction of Macroeconomics, Measures of Income

Week 2. Measures of Cost of Living

Week 3. Economioc Growth, Standard of Living

Week 4. Saving, Investment and Financial Market

Week 5. Basic Financial Tools

Week 6. Unemployment

Week 7. Midterm Exam

Week 8. Money

Week 9. Inflation

Week 10. Open-Economy: Basic concepts

Week 11. Open-Economy: Theories and Applications

Week 12. Economic Flucations and Aggregate Demand and Aggregate Supply

Week 13. Monetary Polices

Week 14. Fiscal Policies

Week 15. Trade off between Inflation and Unemployment

Week 16. Final Exam

methodologies.note: Regular lecture for each topic in order of the appearance in the syllabus.
Group discussion will be initiated for certain topics.
Questions or problems will be thrown to students spontaneously during class.
One group project will be assigned with relevant topics.
Relevant video clips from social media will be assigned for viewing for class discussion.

grading.note: Midterm Exam: multiple choice questions and short essays and problems.
Final Exam: multiple choice questions and short essays and problems.
